expo.name: CourseHawk
expo.description: Searching for courses to take through traditional academic calendars is a frustrating process. Having to navigate to a new page through countless departments to get an idea of certain courses can quickly become a headache. CourseHawk hopes to alleviate this by creating a central hub where students at Wilfrid Laurier University (or anyone that has an iOS or Android phone) can find their courses in an organized and helpful manner.
